4315150.name: Wildwake
4315150.description:
REALISTIC SURVIVAL

Grounded in research on cold-weather physiology and real survival accounts, Wildwake combines physical deterioration and environmental pressure with storytelling and systemic realism. 

The environment responds.
Every choice has consequences.

PSYCHOLOGICAL TENSION

There are no crafting shortcuts. Survival depends on judgment, restraint, and real-world logic.

Face ruthless choices:

  • Keep a frostbitten finger or cut it off

  • Loot a corpse or preserve your sanity

  • Crawl into an unfinished snow shelter or risk the night exposed

FEATURES

  • Body temperature directly limits available decisions

  • Psychological state alters perception and narrative paths

  • Survival mechanics influence story outcomes

  • No clear “good” or “bad” endings

  • Expressive handmade illustrations and immersive sound design
